content.detailedDescription:
I am the assistant state director for missouri mufon, and a start team investigator. the person with me was a star team investigator for kansas mufon.  we had a spectacular ufo sighting while on the last leg of our trip from kansas city to piedmont, mo, located in the se corner of missouri in wayne county.  

the duration of the trip should have been six hours according to my gps.  with stops taken into consideration, we should have arrived at 9:30 p.M., but we arrived at our destination at 10:37 p.M., so we had over an hour of missing time. we cannot account for the missing time. 

as i was driving south on 67 highway past farmington at the very south edge of francious county, i noticed a bright object in the sky to the east.  the object appeared to be three very bright lights in a triangular pattern. it was approximately the size of a large pea held at arm's length. the object was much brighter than any planet (5 x brighter than venus) and was bluish/white in color.  it was at approximately 50 degrees off the horizon and ene of our position. it appeared to get larger and clearer as i watched it. i also had an uneasy feeling, which started before i saw the object.  

i asked my passenger (the other mufon investigator) to take a look at the object, so he opened the sunroom of my suv and watched it. he said the object moved to the north, and when i looked it was gone.  he watched several shooting objects without tails moving from west to northeast, but behaving like shooting stars.  then three long white lights appeared, moving very fast from a ne to sw direction.  the first triangular object appeared and disappeared three times.  these objects moved around the sky for approximately fifteen minutes.  the skies clouded over and we lost sight of the objects. we were both very uneasy about the entire sighting, and thought it was coincidental that this occurred while we were on our way to the piedmont ufo festival where i was speaking.  

while at the event, my computer, which contained the power point presentation on ufo sightings in missouri, was stolen from my locked vehicle. it has since reappeared in my house on my dining room table, minus the power point presentation i was going to use and another one on a different ufo case.  the laptop was not there last night, but was this morning. i am absolutely positive it was in my vehicle, since we discussed taking it inside on the first day of the event (friday), but i said no since i didn't need it until saturday, and moved it to a different spot in the back seat.

also notable: we had some paranormal events happen at the house we were staying at in piedmont, which consisted of scratching and banging noises on the outside of the house and a glass breaking sound inside the house, which two of us heard, as well as some objects moved to different locations.  i had a strange dream about being abducted and restrained on a ufo, but that may be just a dream given the circumstances. 

attached are google earth pictures with the location of the first sighting noted and the location of our destination.  note that east of our first position where the first ufo was spotted is the mississippi river.
content.summary: Multiple ufos and missing time in se missouri mountains

content.detailedDescription: My name is( name deleted moved to evidence box)fg ahve ms in acount from tehran iran univercity iam lining at lagunabeach with my 2 kid they dont married this time and usually i go to my country on time at year ,iam 58 years old and very like to hear and know about ufo ....That set
content.summary: I like to know evrything about ufo

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to assistant state director margie kay by phone: 

i took my dog out at 10:05 pm last night and noticed a fast-moving object shoot directly overhead from horizon to horizon from south to north. the object was ahitish-blue color and was very bright, much brighter than a planet. it moved in bursts, leaving a trail behind it, stopping and starting as it went across the sky.  it flashed four times.  i saw a similar thing at 30 degrees off the horizon moving east to west last night and the night before.  that one was moving east to west. they were too fast to be a satellite, plane, or helicopter.  i just want to know what it was and if anyone else saw it.  the size of the object was smaller than an aspirin.  

note: the witness and his son saw the pheonix lights when they lived in arizona. he states that they were definately not flares.
content.summary: Fast moving object spans horizon in 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside to smoke my friends (name deleted)fg and (name deleted)fg were over for dinner and still inside when realizing i was outside they all headed outside into the backyard we were out there for about 5-10 min when i saw a ball of fire over (name deleted)fg shoulder while in conversation not really thinking twice about it ive seen many shooting stars but it didn't look much like an astroid or debri it looked like a giant roman candle a few seconds after seeing it max was the 1st to bring it to everyones attention by the time we all looked there were several of them flying in staggered pairs or 3's appearing to be over 540 coming from the south possibly even the airport ,oddly enough, their were about 15-20 of them all with a different path some of them went from south to  west over wedington and they went from the tree line in my back yard from south to north making it out of sight in about 45 seconds and were grouped very close we tried taking picures none of which came out that well they seemed to be pretty low altitude and the lights were far bigger than that of a planes flashing lights you couldn't see anything around the lights just balls of fire with no sound no tracers and odd flight taking sharp corners almost swaying back and forth it is hard to put in words how much differently they were than conventional flight i live by the college and see planes and choppers all day long ive never seen anything like this and i would like to know if this is something thst others here or other locations have had similar sightings
content.summary: Very close low altitude fire balls moving rapidly from south to north and west over 540 approx. 15-20 of them.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were standing outside my apartment smoking a ciggerette when i saw an object out of the corner of my eye. at first i just assumed it was a plane because we have military and civilian aircraft fly over alot. we both looked up at the same time and saw a low flying object that appeared to be a distict triangle shape. it had three bright lights on each corner of the triangle, as well as a blinking red light in the middle of the triangle. as it went over us and into the distance, i could see more lights straight accross the back of the object which confirmed to me the triangle shape i was seeing. the object did not make alot of noise and its approach was almost completly silent. after about 20-25 seconds after we first saw the object, it vanished in an instant. amazingly enough, taking a picture was the last thing on my mind. i was so drawn in and amazed at what we were seeing. i have never seen anything like it before. my friend and i didnt even know what to say after it vanished besides, what the #$%& was that thing?
content.summary: A triangle ufo flew low over my apartment complex at a slow speed  then vanished after roughly 25 seconds

content.detailedDescription: This thing has beem looping, diving, climbing and seemingly splitting in two briefly since at least 1 am. it is now 2:30 and if you get this in time, you should still see it. if the left most star of orions belt was the number 3 on a clock, this thing is moving between 7-10. the movements are no possible as far as i know with our technology. i cant record it because my neighbors garage light is too bright for the camera to pick up on it. i have had 7 people go out and look, all agree it's not my imagination. we have been staring at it for a while and are all seeing the same movements. this is not an optical illusion.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Still occuring, looks like a star but it moves dramaticly

content.detailedDescription: I was looking south west at about 40 degrees when a verybright light appeared, moveing to the north. there was no sound or other lights. it then faded out.It was moveing slowly, but it travel about four times the distance i figured it would move on its course. i watched for a few minutes , when it appear much farther north then move on and faded out again. no sound no other colors and it was much brighter then any thing else in the sky.This takes place at my home. i'm not sure what it was, but i've been around airplanes all my life. it didn't act like a plane.
content.summary: Bright white just appeared, move south to north then faded only to reappear many miles north for a brief time then faded again

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of june 17th, 2011 around 23:30 while at an outdoor festival near mount pisgah, oregon i was gazing up at the stars when i noticed what appeared to be a very large, bright, white object in the western sky about a third of the way up from the ground towards the sky's zenith. when i first noticed it, it was stationary and i thought it might be a planet, though it appeared to me larger than i have ever known a planet to appear. as i watched, this object suddenly grew slightly larger with a flash of white light then immediately shrank down to the size of the surrounding stars. as i kept my eye on it the small light slowly begin moving upwards toward the zenith of the star field, faded away and was gone about 5 seconds after it started moving.
about 10 minutes later i noticed two very large, bright white objects in the southern sky. they appeared exactly as the first object did in brightness and size and they appeared to be about a hands width distance apart if i stretched my arm out in front of me. the lights were rather high in the sky, about 2/3 of the way up from the ground to sky's ceiling. they were positioned vertically to one another. i watched them in this stationary position for at about 10 seconds.  at that time they shrank down to the size of stars and then begin moving together toward the west very slowly.  they appeared to move together as one unit, keeping an equal distance apart as they moved. they grew dimmer and disappeared about 5 seconds after they started moving.
i kept watching the sky for about 30 minutes after the last sighting but i never saw any other usual lights. i was very curious what these lights could have been and i spent a lot of time trying to think of a mundane explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: I saw 3 bright lights in the sky near eugene,  oregon that shrank in size, moved away and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had a feeling to come outside at around 10 pm. i saw a large bright light that stayed for a moment the slowly check marked out of the visible atmosphere. this was my 2nd time seeing the same type of craft at the same location down the street where i live, i highly doubt that it was military tech.
content.summary: Dropped elevation above a proximate high school, checkmarked out

content.detailedDescription: Hi, it's me (name deleted)fg who reported over thirty three sightings last year from june 27th through november 3 when things waned a bit. anyway, i was with a friend outside my back yard kind of talking about the kinds of sightings i experienced when at exactly 1:13am a star appeared in the northwestern sky and moved somewhat quickly to the east and before it went into a constellation it got brighter and then disappeared. after seeing so many sighting all my life i recognized it as my celestial friends. i actually felt glad to see them.
content.summary: Star appears in the northwestern sky, moves eastward, gets briter and then disappears

content.city: Sedona, just NW of Bell C
content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation in sedona, az.  i brought my canon 5d mark ii 21.1 megapixel camera and tripod to do some photography of the stars.  i've never really read the directions so i just used the automatic settings.  various ones preset on the camera.  one setting allowed longer exposures to get better light into the camera.  that evening, me and my girlfriend are in heavy winter gear, it's an absolutely clear night, the moon is out, and it is slightly windy.  the temperature is about 25 degrees fahrenheit.  we only stay about 30 minutes because even with our gear on we're freezing out butts off.  we didn't notice the object until we got home and uploaded it to my macbook pro 17" laptop.   i didn't notice the object even after first run through, as i was looking for the airplane as a baseline of what a time exposure picture looked like.  a friend was taking a second look and noticed the objects.  she noticed it right away.   this was the first time i have ever had a personal experience with a ufo / or unexplained phenomena.  i had to review he picture over and over and rationalize and justify that nothing on the planet that i know of moves like this object does.  obviously airplanes fly in usually one trajectory and look like one line or a smeared color from it's lights on the wing tips... and the flashing produces a brighter dot, at regular intervals.   i lost sight of object when i turned the camera and continued fishing, towards the north, towards the sedona airport.

so i shoot towards the moon as a baseline, which was nearly perfectly west.  if you were at bell canyon, just north one rest area... there is a pull off to view the sky and stars, on the west side of the road.  we setup the camera on a tripod and start shooting.   using an aluminum tripod (of not that great quality) i was able to get a number of shots of the sky.  i decided to see what an airplane looks like in a picture using a longer exposure (set by the camera).  i zoom out to about 190mm, of the 200mm lens on my canon ef 70-200mm l ultrasonic lens.  the lens is a $1500 accessory.  i'm shooting with the canon 5d mark ii which runs about $3500.  so the setup is about $5000 plus the tripod.    in 4 of the pictures i capture movement, and some smearing of the stars / and airplane path.  and then later i noticed the "star" like object that moved in 3 different frames, all time delayed 6 seconds.  in the first frame you see the star / ufo start at the bottom, move up, then to the right, then to the left in a curve, then up and stop.  you'll see the object "radiate" light brighter than any other object, and it has haze around the image.  no other stars or the airplane even look like this.   in the 2nd picture the ufo/ object moved in the exact opposite direction, while the plane in the bottom of the picture has moved more north.  you'll also see the shadow of the tree line as i was shooting at about a 20 degree angle above the horizon.  in picture 3 of 3, you'll see the object start at the bottom, move to the left, then curve back down and to the right, then up stopping there, and you'll see the object "glowing" near the top.  you'll still see the airplane in the frame near the bottom.   however since i moved the camera to the north, you'll have to align the object by the nearby stars to make sure it's the same object, which it is.  then i took a wide angle shot of the entire sky.... and it looks like there are 3-5 objects moving in sync.... unless it's just the lens smearing from camera/tripod shake... but if so... why aren't the other stars all smeared like the 3-5 brighter objects.   all of these are shooting directly west and to the north west a few degrees north of due west.  the moon is directly behind me, and that could be the reason why the object is "glowing" or emitting a light source back to the camera.
content.summary: Star shooting - captured object moving in erratic path while photographing an airplane flying north
content.locationName: Sedona, just NW of Bell C, Arizona

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the sidewalk with a four of my friends at about 2am after leaving a bar when one noticed a bright orange light traveling across the sky. it appeared to be flying low and was extremely fast. this was in chicago at clark and winnemac while we were walking north on clark street.  it was very bright orange, and larger than anything i've seen before.  we knew immediately it wasn't a plane because we could see two other planes flying in the sky and they were much higher and farther away in the sky.  the planes were a different color- more yellowish/whitish and were moving much slower relative to the orange light.  we stared at it trying to determine if it was a helicopter or plane, but it didn't look like anything any of us had seen before. it was literally a round very bright orange light moving forward very fast. one of my friends even described it as looking like a planet moving fast across the sky.  we were watching for about 45 seconds as it moved very rapidly across the sky in a straight line then the orange light dimmed, and completely disappeared.  we watched for 5 minutes after the disappearance but it didn't become visible again.   all we could see were the two planes that continued to fly. we were all pretty confused as to its disappearance because none of us have ever seen a plane that disappeared while flying across the sky.
content.summary: Bright organge light low flying and moving fast through sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter just got home. we were in driveway in front of my parents house. sun was down but sky was still lit. the full moon was coming up eastern horizon about 1/3 up. she got to door i was looking at birds fly in front of moon and asked her to come look at them. we saw black buzzard like birds. then a flock of sea gulls flew past. then from higher above these birds came down what look like confetti. they came spiraling down then all would fly off in a different direction and disappear. all except for two. they came down spiraling like others except turned south and flew in a straight line. one slightly higher than other. parallel to each another. the bottom one was slightly ahead. they then stopped and just sat there. my daughter and i were watching and kept staring. i asked her if she sees what i see and she described it the same way. we were just puzzled but not scared. told her wanted to make sure i'm not seeing different. after 3-5 minuets they faded from sight. when she couldn't see them to well she said i don't want to look away or i won't find it. that was funny to me and i said i was just thinking those exact words. i would say they must have been 6 feet wide. either like balls or maybe disc shape. but an egg would be accurate to. couldn't tell if they were flat. when they spiraled down they look like disc shaped paper. so maybe they were flat. i think width of 6 feet because they were much higher than the birds. in fact birds kept flying without changing direction. they weren't frightened or afraid of colliding. telling me this object(s) were not close to them. yet from my perspective looked about same size of larger black birds i believe to be buzzards . they have a large wingspan. i would estimate maybe 3 feet from tip to tip. so if objects were higher than it would be larger. my guess is they were larger than the birds. it couldn't be debris. how and why would two pieces turn in a straight line then just stop in mid air? and there was no sound but it did seem far up to maybe be heard. my daughter was ok but now she is a bit scared and doesn't like to talk about that day. she doesn't deny seeing them just refuses to think of them as ufo's. i'm still puzzled to this day at what it could've been. (name deleted moved to evidence section)fg
content.summary: Confetti like  fell from sky then flew off in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba pescando en el muelle de puntarenas con mi hermano a medio dia y un hijo mio nos tomo la foto,cuando la pase a la computadora vi un objeto al fondo de nosotros , ninguno de nosotros vio nungun objeto volar en ese momento.En mi computadora no pude identificar bien que era porque con el zoom se ve borroso.

translation:
was in the spring fishing with my brother puntarenas a half day my son and we took a picture when the computer go to object to the fund vi of us, none of us saw nungun flying object in that my computer moment i could not because it was good to identify with the zoom is blurred.
content.summary: Una fotografia en el muelle de puntarenas-costa rica.

content.detailedDescription:
at aprox. 22:18 central (03:18 zulu time), 3 friends, and myself witnessed 10 -15, orange - yellow flying lights. the lights appeared to be flying from south to north in fayetteville arkansas, along interstate 540, in triangular like formations. the lights made no sound and no contrail.  3 or 4 lights seemed too turn west along wedington road. atleast 2 other lights disappeared from sight completely in an unknown direction , the rest of the lights continued north over interstate 540.

	the lights appeared to be under 10,000 feet (3,030.3 meters) and moving quite fast but at varying speeds. i witnessed what seemed to be 1 light dropping  altitude, speeding  up and  passing another light in the same formation. the light that was passed  then broke sharp to the west and a few other lights  behind it followed along the same route west over wedington road.

	i can say with 100% assuredness  that in my 6 yrs launching rockets as a mlrs crew member in the us army national guard, and my time in iraq watching night time take offs and bombing raids by us jets, multiple helicopter formation  at night, and uav flights, that it was nothing like anything i have ever seen while being in  the military. i am also an avid stargazer and satellite watcher. saturn was almost right over head (maybe 80 degrees above the horizon) and most of the lights seemd to be at least 3 to 4 times as bright as saturn.

	the 2 pictures i took on  my phone did not capture the full formations, or other relative objects. the pictures are a bad quality but i would provide the pictures to any one who wants to study further.
content.summary: Lights in the sky over fayetteville

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on highway 12 . sky and visibility were clear . wind was typical 10 to 15 mph and on shore . noticed a round shiny thingy(?) traveling app. north to south at a pretty good rate of speed over a hundred miles an hour (?). size may have been 20 to 40 feet in diameter and guessing the altitude at about 15-2500 feet . what struck me was how fast it was moving and as it was moving in a straight line against the wind .Not a ballon , plane or jet . i was only able to see it and clearly for 10-15 seconds before it was no longer visible. don't know what i saw but no ballon travels against the wind ! anyways ,happy fathers day to all .
content.summary: I was traveling west on hwy 12. metalic shiny sphere shaped obect appeared to be traveling north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my picnic table ,glanced at the sky to watch the sun set.As soon as i looked up i saw the object. it was traveling in a straight line from north to south.It traveled in a flat line along the horizon.It was very reflective so it was easy to detect.I didn't know what it might be but when it disappeared twice i first thought ufo.    
this object was cigar shaped.It had a short vapor trail.As i watched it the vapor trail began to vanish. as the vapor trail was almost gone,the object disappeared.This vanishing and re-appearing happened twice in a cloudless sky. after the second vanishing both trail and object totally disappeared. the event lasted approx 2 min.I have never seen anything like it. the event didn't last long enough for a photo or a video.
content.summary: As the sun was setting i noticed a strange object in the sky to the west. it kept disappearing and reappearing.

content.detailedDescription: It was 11:21 pm and there were 9 of us sitting in the backyard at a friends house and one of us yelled to look to the south side of the yard in the sky. there was a bright orange glowing/luminescent orb/fireball traveling west very fast then turned north around the treeline. once past the treeline it seemed to hover and descend a large distance very quickly. then seemed to almost recover and continue on its path northbound until out of sight past the horizon towards the northwest, which is about 10 km from our location, towards headingley. it looked quite large and was travelling very fast. it was viewed by all of us for about three straight minutes. it almsot looked like it was on fire, i caught some of the event on cell phone video, although the video doesnt quite due the sighting justice. also the object made no noise at all.
content.summary: Fireball ufo seen cruising over winnipeg

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, after dropping my girlfriend home. we had just come from a night out in brooklyn and manhattan. i was driving on the grand central parkway heading east bound to the cross island parkway at 3:45 am on sunday june, 19 2011. when i noticed this bright star like object in the sky to my right. it looked like it was moving, but i'm not sure if it was to me being in motion or not. so i kept monitoring this bright lit thing in the sky. i was trying to distingiush if it was a star or a plane. when i merged onto the cross island parkway south bound, i decided to pull over on the side of the parkway at the union turnpike exit ramp besides the parkway. i put the car in park, and could see this bright lit thing to my left now. i observed it for about for about 2-3 minutes before driving off. i did notice, it wasn't moving. so i knew it wasn't a plane. another thing, i took notice of, was that it wasn't pulsating like a star. it just seemed to stand out, because there was no other stars, or clouds in the sky. it also seemed bigger then a usual star, and maybe not as far as a star. i might be wrong, and it could possibly be a star. but, i decided to take a picture at 3:49 am. to my surprise when i got home minutes later and looked at the picture, and zoomed in on my iphone. i noticed it had a shape to it. i thought, that was unusual. i do have a understanding of ufo's, as i've been intrigued in the subject for years. i've never had a sighting before, but i don't look up as often as some people do. but, i do know the difference, between planes, stars, and other things. i wish i had taken more pictures, and monitored it longer. since, it didn't move, i decided to go home. i texted to my girlfriend at 3:59 am. i also emailed it to a close friend at 4am.
content.summary: Something i saw while driving home

content.detailedDescription: Monitoring traffic cams and saw this
content.summary: Traffic cam

content.detailedDescription: My son and his girlfriend were outside at approximately 10:00 pm observing an object moving across sky. my son came inside and told me they were observing a ufo. i went outside with them and we observed a bright orange orb shaped object floating in the distance over the city. it was changing in color from orange to yellowish and orange again and would appear to stop occasionally and then move again. the object was not floating down but across the sky. i observed the light to be much larger than a light you would see on an airplane. it was not making any sound and the sky was clear except a thunderstorm was brewing in the northeast sky. the object was heading into the direction of the storm and eventually dissapeared. this was nothing like i have ever observed before. what is more interesting is was in the direction over haaf base. we did not get any photos because we just did'nt think of it. too weird and beautiful. thinking back and wondering how to describe, i think best is, think of the sun setting and this was much much smaller.
content.summary: Very orange sphere shape object moving across city.

content.detailedDescription: The object hover in south direction glowing in orange color for several seconds then quickly move north stop and quickly moved east until disappeared. my wife and daughter witness the event and was able to capture the event on her iphone.
content.summary: Orb like moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: Me and my kids and my nieces were up tonight because we are having a bad thunderstorm, so we decided to look out my patio windows and look at the lightning, what we seen astounded us, we have never seen this ever... well hovering down the street above some houses, behind some trees what a huge disc shaped object with bright spinning blue lights, it shot out like 3 or 4 bright beams of light, then the blue lights went out then reappeared bright blue spinning lights again, then all of a sudden it zipped up, and shot out another bright beam of light when it disappeared... a few minutes later we were all freaking out with what we just saw, so we were glued to the window to see where it went if it would pop up again, and it did, briefly above the complex in front of us, then disapeared again..Since then we haven't seen it... but we want to know if anyone else witnessed this where we live. we are really afraid.  when we first seen it we thought immediatly it was a ufo, it was hovering low to the ground, it was not a plane or helicoptor or nothing of that, we were having a really bad storm and neither one of those can hover and sit and fly that low, and shoot out beams and have large bright blue spinning lights.  we are confused, afraid, want to know what it was and is, why it was there, what it was doing..We are terrified. unfortunatly we didn't capture any photos, we were glued to the windows to even run for the camera.
content.summary: Big disc shaped, bright blue lights spinning in a circular motion, with a white light in the center

content.detailedDescription: My mother, my nephew and i were on  our back deck,,we were watching the sky, as we always do looking for ufo's when my 2 year old nephew said " alien spaceship" and pointed to the sky south of us..We laughed and continued talking about how weird it was that he said that..He likes all types of sky vehicles and my mother said to him "look, here comes an airplane", we all looked up to see a flash of light over the trees in front of us,,then a flash of light to the south then a few blinks and it was north then a blink to the east and it was gone..All of this without a sound.  since we live on the third floor, it took me a minute to get down to the parking lot, i watched the sky til my mother and nephew came down to look too..We saw nothing..We walked to an area with a bigger expanse of sky and watched for about half an hour to see if we could see it again, but there was no repeat sighting..The tiny ball of light zig zagged across the sky   in the directional pattern i described above..The whole event lasted approximately 10 seconds.It was very exciting..My mother knew what it was as soon as it began zig zagging across the sky,this was mt moms third encounter..She was witness to the sighting in the hudson valley in 1984, ao ahe was thrilled, not afraid. the time of the event was 11:45 p.M.
content.summary: Flashing light traveling west to east then south to north then east in less than 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading to work thursday night when i moved into the right lane on route 29 in chillicothe to yield to an ambulance that was heading toward the rome/mossville area.  i was listening to station 99.9 and noticed that it quite abruptly turned to static as i passed an abandoned fuel station.  as soon as i passed the station i saw two very large, orange lights just hovering above the cemetary at the corner of rt. 29 and cloverdale road and my blood ran cold.  i immediately turned right on cloverdale and pulled into the cemetary.  people were pulling into mcdonalds across the street and jumping out of their cars, pointing at the lights.  i turned off my headlights and got out of my car, grabbing my cellphone.  i called my brother right away and told him to get down to the cemetary immediately, explaining what i was seeing.  

i watched them for next few minutes as they just stayed above the cemetary, not moving.  the one on the right moved closer to the one on the left, which was much closer to me, and that's when i saw the top of the larger one from the light being reflected off of it.  it was teardrop shaped or cone shaped, the base being the largest part and glowing an extremely bright orange.  the very top had these long spikes coming out of it that sort of went out and down instead of pointing up.  i estimate there were at least 10 or 12 of them from the side that i could get a look at.  the smaller one started heading off toward the field behind the cemetary and the bigger one followed.  

i called my brother back and told them that they were on the move, but within 40 seconds or so they just sort of dimmed and were gone.  they didn't disappear behind anything and they didn't just "turn off"...They just dimmed their lights down and were gone.  i got back into my car and started driving down cloverdale toward where they had gone.  when i reached the high school on bradley i noticed a helicopter heading straight in their direction.  my brother called me a minute later to tell me that he'd seen one of them disappear by the high school and then saw the same helicopter heading toward truitt, about 6-8 blocks away from where one of them had disappeared.  we weren't able to make much sense of it, but definitely believe that the helicopter was following in their direction.

i've never seen anything like it.  all i know is that it left me with a very strong feeling that i saw something that i wasn't supposed to see.  anytime i think about it i feel the hairs stand up on the back of my neck.  unfortunately, i only thought to call my brother and it never dawned on my to take pictures.
content.summary: 2 bright, orange ovals above field.  floated for 4 minutes then moved 100 ft and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 4 objects where seen my me and my passenger, (name deleted)fg, approximately at mile marker 26 heading north on i-55.  these object were flying slow over the interstate.  one oject was away from the other three.  two objects where flying parallel and close to each other and the other object was making curves in flight, while flying with the other three objects.  other cars noticed these objects and the rate of traffic slowed.  i am an airplane nut and noticed there where no red and blue or white lights, nor did i see any strob lights blinking on the objects.  and no sound came from the objects as my window was down.  these objects where auburn in color.
content.summary: 4 circle objects, auburn in color

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a series of pictures of a storm coming from the west of my apartment. i have a nice view and decided to start capturing some scenes of the sunsets and the storms that i get to see. so this was a great moment to catch the sun setting in the west as a storm was encroaching. the sun was bright and when i took the picture my eyes where having a hard time seeing ...Because of the glare of the sun. so i took the picture. as i pulled my eyes away from the camera phone i began to see lights dancing in the clouds...A flash here and another there. i thought perhaps it was just my eyes acting up from the intense sun...I thought i was getting sun flashes in my eyes. i continued to watch for a period of perhaps 4 min, and kept seeing flashes...Thinking . "boy i really screwed up my eyes with that picture." i went back into the apartment never thinking anything of it. anyhow, i captured something interesting...And i have other pictures of interest.
content.summary: Taking pictures of storm coming in.

content.detailedDescription: Getting ready for work, i felt a vibration and went outside to the back yard. the object was just gliding over the back of the house. very very slow.It was flying low just over the tree tops and power lines. it was very visable to me and not something seen from a distance. there were whitish/yellow lights on side. also a lot of detail underneath such as the outline of passage ways, vents etc. i am not sure what to call it but the object was not smooth underneath. there was absolutely no sound, it was dark almost black. it glided over the house to the next street, then wham it sped away so fast i didn't see it in a matter of seconds. still silent. this event took place in simi valley ca. the street name was roldan. when i got to work at the telephone company one of the other women there said her husband told her a similar story. the next day i understand 2 police officers reported a story of having seen a ufo the night before. to this day (even though my husband and friends tease me) i know this was a real ufo. up until then i never really thought about ufos. but, i am a believer now. i know not every sighting can be real, but this one was! a few years ago, on a whim, we went to roswell while traveling. i reported my story at the museam. one of the staff members said to me "oh, you saw a mother ship"! i wonder if it's true.
content.summary: Flew low over house humming sound, lights, a lot of detail underneath

content.detailedDescription:
i recall that it was a beautiful sunny morning, just a perfect temperature sort of day.     we were both single men from michigan, my buddy lived in town and, at that time, i lived at the valdez marine terminal construction camp.     we both had sunday off and had decided to have a good breakfast and take a cruise up the highway.     i was impressed that the day seemed very quiet and sleepy.     there were few people up and about as we had breakfast.
      we left pickin' our teeth and had no well-defined destination in mind so i just turned right out of "the totem" restaurant and motel.     it was just s relaxed and quiet sunday morn.     "the totem" was just on the edge of this little alaskan community and my right-hand turn points you at a tight left-hand turn in the highway only a few hundred feet away.     
      as we began the swing into this left-hand turn in the highway we both had our attention stolen by what abruptly entered into our field of view just off the highway to our right approximately 150' - 175' away.
it was so bizzare that i made a conscious decision to concentrate on a couple of specific items so that i might recall those items later on.
( i fully realized at that moment just how unusual this was to my routine everyday sights and nothing before lent any perspective so i was just trying to instill common sense to the moments of this unique observation !!)

      i state the following with great confidence:

     the "craft" .... oval in shape .... approx. 30' - 35' diameter .... the exact color and transluscence of new bubblegum ater chewing it for only a couple of minutes and then blowing a bubble, ( lotsa sugar still in it to give it that luminescence ).    it was 6.5' - 8.0' in height.              around the outside perimeter was a feature that looked a lot like lab hose, ( +- 3/4" ).     i estimate the diameter of this "hose" to be three quarters of an inch, and, individual lights revolved inside the "hose" every  4' - 5', in a counter-clockwise flow.      the light looked as though it expanded the "hose" as it traveled from left to right around the craft.     i recall being particularly impressed by the ability for the hose which, at the same time seemed so much a part and parcel of the craft,  seemed to effortlessly expand and then contract as the light coursed it's way around. 
      when i saw enough of the foregoing i began to catch glimpses before i drove out of view around said corner, leaving my friend to continue his observation before it went out of his view also.       glimpses:    i'm sure that i saw a ramp dropped from the belly of this craft, approximately 4' - 5' wide and 6' - 7' long.      i believe i observed two metallic extensions which comprised at least a part of the "landing gear".      last, but certainly not least, i saw two small grey-green animals, that looked like the stereo-typical description of "aliens".     at this distance of 50 or sixty yards i cannot provide any specific details.      they were 4' - 5' tall, seemed to be in a quandary, ( i got a very distinct feeling that they were caught with their pants down and were in much of a hurry.      then, they were out of my line of sight.
      i saw my buddy turning to look out his window as i continued round the corner and, perhaps ten seconds later, sitting on the edge of the seat he turned staring vacantly out the windshield .... ( his mind was very obviously involved with what he'd just seen ).      i said, "did you see what i just saw"!?!      he did not answer and simply continued to look straight out the front windshield.      for the third time i began to ask him that same question when he abruptly turned to me and nearly shouted, "you're ******* right i did", and immediately got that far-away look in his eyes again.      i said, should we turn around and go back!?!      he immediately and with emphasis replied, "no!!"      i drove as far as the "salmon turnaround", ( +- 2 tenths of a mile away from the corner we'd made our observations ), and turned around there and went back.      it was nowhere to be seen and my friend was against going out toward the beach area where we'd seen it.      i searched the skies for it or a contrail or anything that would tip off its location.      i looked at the beach for skid marks, and the immediate mud-flat and water for a wake or concentric circles of it going beneath the water.     nothing.      i'll estimate that from the moment we saw the craft until we returned to the site and found it gone was less than four minutes.      my friend became increasingly unwilling to discuss the event after a few months and refuses to acknowledge the entire experience these days  ---"geez, i don't remember".      
not acknowledging reality when it is imposed upon us is, i'm convinced, some of the worst of circumstances that we can impose on one another.
content.summary: Friend and i observe opaque craft-like 30' - 35' oval object as we left town in my pickup after restaurant breakfast approximately 400' away from scene.

content.detailedDescription: Was bike riding late at night, saw an orange glow in the sky. look closely and saw a circular orange ball the size of a big star. it moved slowly and straight like a sattelite but it was moving a bit quicker than a satellite usually does. it glided very smoothely through the sky dimming out occaisionaly then the light just went out. i was a little spooked when i saw this object, i thought it could be a sattelite but i have never seen one with that vivid of an orange color. especially going over our small town.
content.summary: Orange circle moving slowly through sky
